tasks.content: Interviews/workshops with stakeholders to understand current processes, software and resources.

effort.content: PM plus a facilitator if required will spend up to 20 days finding out and mapping current efforts

tasks.content: Agree who & which software will be involved in collection, aggregation and consumption.

effort.content: PM will make recommendation to project board to make a decision

tasks.content: Map out the process to be used for collecting data into a single repository

effort.content: Service provider/collector will submit their data in 1 day.Collectors will continue to work in the scope

tasks.content: Allocate service providers to a team of assurers, with guidance on how data can be trusted by consumers.

effort.content: Assurer will work on initial data for 0.5 day per service provider and then 0.25 per regular assurance

tasks.content: A database will be used to store all the collected data. De-duplication should be considered

effort.content: Automated process will need to be set up and then used throughout project
